attributes.action: Stop Job Seekers allowance to those who have been charged and convicted of buying and selling illegal drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick and tired of paying Tax and National Insurance (in the hundreds each month) so that people who buy and sell illegal drugs and substances are allowed to sign on.  It isn't fair.  I subsidise their habits and illegal activities.  I pay for their stay in prisons and rehab.  If you cannot stop their benefits, then at least drastically lower the amount of tax us hard working people pay in our salaries so that we don't think it is unfair.
